TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract RibbonMenu implements class Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComponent, class Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonControl, class System.ComponentModel.IComponent, class System.IDisposable

summary.span: 表示功能区选项卡或 Microsoft Office 菜单上的菜单。

span.span: Represents a menu on a Ribbon tab or on the Microsoft Office Menu.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 将**菜单**控件从 "**工具箱**" 的 " **Office 功能区控件**" 选项卡拖动到功能区设计器上时, Visual Studio 将创建一个对象。Visual Studio creates a object when you drag a **Menu** control from the **Office Ribbon Controls** tab of the **Toolbox** onto the Ribbon Designer. 您可以通过使用 对象的方法在运行时创建。You can create a at run time by using the method of the object. 可通过两种方法来访问 对象：There are two ways to access the object: - 通过使用 Ribbon 类的 `Factory` 属性。By using the `Factory` property of the Ribbon class. 可从 Ribbon 类中的代码使用此方法。Use this approach from code in your Ribbon class. - 通过使用 `Globals.Factory.GetRibbonFactory` 方法。By using the `Globals.Factory.GetRibbonFactory` method. 可从 Ribbon 类外的代码使用此方法。Use this approach from code outside your Ribbon class. ## 常规任务Common Tasks 下表列出了可用于常见任务的成员。The following table lists members that are useful for common tasks. 所有这些任务都可以在设计时执行。All of these tasks can be performed at design time. 其中一些任务只能在功能区加载到 Office 应用程序之前或在运行时将控件添加到动态菜单之前在运行时执行。Some of these tasks can be performed at run time only before the Ribbon is loaded into the Office application or before the control is added to a dynamic menu at run time. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview)。For more information, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview). |任务Task|成员Member| |----------|------------| |显示菜单上的图像。Display an image on the menu.|使用或属性。Use the or property.

还可以重复使用出现在内置功能区控件中的图像。You can also reuse images that appear in built-in Ribbon controls. 为此, 请将设置为要显示为菜单图标的内置 Microsoft Office 映像的 ID。To do this, set to the ID of a built-in Microsoft Office image that you want to display as the icon for the menu.| |更改菜单的大小。Change the size of the menu.|将属性设置为所需的值。Set the property to the value you want. 例如, 对于大菜单, 将其设置为`Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`。For example, for a large menu, set it to `Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`.| |更改菜单中项的大小。Change the size of items in the menu.|将属性设置为所需的值。Set the property to the value you want. 例如, 若要显示更大的项, 请`Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`将其设置为。For example, to display larger items, set it to `Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`.| |在运行时启用对菜单的更改 (例如, 允许在运行时将控件添加到菜单中)。Enable changes to the menu at run time (for example, to enable controls to be added to the menu at run time).|将 属性设置为 `true`。Set the property to `true`.| |访问菜单中的控件, 将控件添加到菜单中, 或从菜单中删除控件。Access the controls in the menu, add controls to the menu, or remove controls from the menu.|使用 属性。Use the property.| |将菜单添加到 Microsoft Office 菜单、组或其他可包含菜单的控件。Add a menu to the Microsoft Office Menu, a group, or to another control that can contain menus.|将添加 `Items`到 Microsoft Office 菜单、组或控件的属性。Add a to the `Items` property of the Microsoft Office Menu, group, or control.| [!INCLUDE[vsto_interface](~/includes/vsto-interface-md.md)] ## 用法Usage [!INCLUDE[vsto_net35mref](~/includes/vsto-net35mref-md.md)] ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何在运行时向现有菜单添加和填充子菜单。The following example demonstrates how to add and populate a sub-menu to an existing menu at run time. 有关在运行时更新控件并涉及使用语言集成查询 (LINQ) 从 AdventureWorks 示例数据库中获取数据的更丰富的示例, 请参阅[演练:在运行时](/visualstudio/vsto/walkthrough-updating-the-controls-on-a-ribbon-at-run-time)更新功能区上的控件。For a richer example that updates controls at run-time and involves getting data from the AdventureWorks sample database using Language-Integrated Queries (LINQ), see [Walkthrough: Updating the Controls on a Ribbon at Run Time](/visualstudio/vsto/walkthrough-updating-the-controls-on-a-ribbon-at-run-time). 若要运行此代码示例, 必须首先执行以下步骤:To run this code example, you must first perform the following steps: 1. 向 Office 项目添加 "**功能区 (可视化设计器)** " 项。Add a **Ribbon (Visual Designer)** item to an Office project. 2. 将组添加到自定义选项卡。Add a group to the custom tab. 3. 将菜单添加到组。Add a menu to the group. 4. 将菜单的 " **(Name)** " 属性设置`CustomerMenu`为。Set the **(Name)** property of the menu to `CustomerMenu`. 5. 将菜单的 "**标签**" 属性设置为 " **Customers**"。Set the **Label** property of the menu to **Customers**. 6. 将菜单的**动态**属性设置为`true`。Set the **Dynamic** property of the menu to `true`. 这样，在功能区加载到 Office 应用程序中之后，就可以在运行时添加和删除菜单上的控件。This enables you to add and remove controls on the menu at run time after the Ribbon is loaded into the Office application. [!code-csharp[Trin_Ribbon_ControlProperties#14](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_Ribbon_ControlProperties/CS/Ribbon1.cs#14)] [!code-vb[Trin_Ribbon_ControlProperties#14](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_Ribbon_ControlProperties/VB/Ribbon1.vb#14)]

summary.span: 获取或设置菜单的大小。

span.span: Gets or sets the size of the menu.

value.span: 一个RibbonControlSize , 它表示菜单的大小。

span.span: A Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize that represents the size of the menu.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果菜单嵌套在另一个菜单中, 则此属性不起作用。This property has no effect if the menu is nested in another menu. 嵌套菜单的属性始终设置为。 `Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeRegular`The property of a nested menu is always set to `Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeRegular`. 若要使嵌套菜单显示得更大, 请将父菜单的属性`Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`设置为。To make a nested menu appear larger, set the property of the parent menu to `Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`.

summary.span: 获取或设置当前菜单上显示的文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the text that appears on the current menu.

value.span: 在菜单上显示的文本。

span.span: The text that appears on the menu.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当当前菜单嵌套在另一个菜单或拆分按钮中, 并且父菜单或拆分`ItemSize`按钮的属性设置为`Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`时, 将显示说明。The description appears when the current menu is nested in another menu or split button, and the `ItemSize` property of the parent menu or split button is set to `Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否可在运行时修改菜单。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the menu can be modified at run time.

value.span: 如果可在运行时修改菜单，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the menu can be modified at run time; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果要在运行`true`时将控件添加到菜单, 请在 Microsoft Office 应用程序加载功能区后, 将属性设置为。Set the property to `true` if you want to add controls to the menu at run time, after the Ribbon is loaded by the Microsoft Office application. 对于在设计时添加到功能区的菜单, 只能在加载功能区之前设置属性。For menus that you add to the Ribbon at design time, the property can be set only before the Ribbon loads. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview)。For more information, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview). 仅在某些情况下, 才能在运行时设置此属性。This property can be set at run time only under certain conditions. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview)。For more information, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview).

summary.span: 获取或设置在菜单上显示的图像。

span.span: Gets or sets the image that is displayed on the menu.

value.span: 一个在菜单上显示的 。

span.span: An that is displayed on the menu.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建议的图像格式为 PNG, 因为 PNG 格式的图像通过其 alpha 通道支持透明度。The recommended image format is PNG, because images in the PNG format support transparency through their alpha channel. 属性标识控件显示的图像。The property identifies an image that is displayed by the control. 此属性可在设计时或运行时设置。This property can be set at design time or at run time. 如果在运行时更新此属性, 控件的外观将更新以反映更改。If you update this property at run time, the control's appearance is updated to reflect the change. 如果设置了 属性, 则将忽略和属性。 If the property is set, the and properties are ignored. 尽管属性比其他两个属性提供的控件更多, 但它可能会变慢, 因为每次更新控件时, 都会将 image 对象发送到 Office 应用程序。Although the property gives you more control than the other two properties do, it can be slower because the image object is sent to the Office application every time the control is updated. 属性`true`必须为, 控件才能显示图像。The property must be `true` for the control to display the image. 在设计时设置属性时, Visual Studio 会将属性自动设置为`true`。When you set the property at design time, Visual Studio automatically sets the property to `true`. 如果在运行时设置属性, 必须在代码中将属性设置为`true` 。If you set the property at run time, you must set the property to `true` in your code.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个名称，该名称可用于在 事件处理程序中标识菜单的图像。

span.span: Gets or sets the name that you can use in the event handler to identify an image for the menu.

value.span: 一个名称，该名称可用于在 事件处理程序中标识菜单的图像。

span.span: The name that you can use in the event handler to identify an image for the menu.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性标识控件显示的图像。The property identifies an image that is displayed by the control. Office 应用程序仅从解决方案中检索一次此映像, 以提高性能。The Office application retrieves this image from your solution only once, to improve performance. 只能在设计时设置此属性, 因为该属性标识的图像将在事件中加载。This property can be set only at design time, because the image it identifies is loaded during the event. 当显示功能区时, 每个映像名称只引发一次。 is raised only once per image name, when the Ribbon is displayed. 之后, 不能使用此属性更改控制图像。After that, the control image cannot be changed by using this property. 若要加载图像, 请将代码添加到事件处理程序。To load the image, add code to the event handler. 检查的属性,并将对象的属性设置为要加载的图像。 Check the property of the and set the property of the object to the image that you want to load. 如果设置了属性或属性, 则忽略此属性。This property is ignored if either the property or the property is set. 与属性标识的图像相比, 属性所标识的映像的加载速度要快得多, 因为 Office 应用程序只会在首次显示功能区时从你的解决方案中检索该图像。Images identified by the property can be loaded slightly faster than images identified by the property, because the Office application retrieves the image from your solution only the first time the Ribbon is displayed. 属性`true`必须为, 控件才能显示图像。The property must be `true` for the control to display the image. 在设计时设置属性时, Visual Studio 会将属性自动设置为`true`。When you set the property at design time, Visual Studio automatically sets the property to `true`. 如果在运行时设置属性, 必须在代码中将属性设置为`true` 。If you set the property at run time, you must set the property to `true` in your code.

summary.span: 获取菜单上的控件的集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of controls that are on the menu.

value.span: 菜单上的控件的集合。

span.span: The collection of controls that are on the menu.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要在运行时向菜单添加功能区控件, 请创建控件的实例, 然后将新控件添加到集合中。To add a Ribbon control to a menu at run time, create an instance of the control, and then add the new control to the collection. 如果要在功能区加载到 Office 应用程序中后执行此操作, 则必须将属性设置为。 `true`If you want to do this after the Ribbon is loaded into the Office application, you must set the property to `true`. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview)。For more information, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview). 使用功能区设计器将控件添加到菜单时, Visual Studio 会自动将控件添加到菜单的属性中。When you add controls to a menu by using the Ribbon Designer, Visual Studio automatically adds the controls to the property of the menu.

exception.span: 加载功能区后，可尝试在此集合中添加、移除或替换 。

span.span: You try to add, remove, or replace a to this collection after the Ribbon is loaded.

summary.span: 获取或设置菜单上控件的大小。

span.span: Gets or sets the size of the controls on the menu.

value.span: 一个RibbonControlSize , 它表示菜单上的控件的大小。

span.span: A Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize that represents the size of the controls on the menu.

value.span: 默认值为RibbonControlSize. RibbonControlSizeRegular。

span.span: The default is Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeRegular.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要放大菜单上的控件, 请将父菜单的属性设置为。 `Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`To enlarge controls that are on the menu, set the property of the parent menu to `Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`. 仅在某些情况下, 才能在运行时设置此属性。This property can be set at run time only under certain conditions. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview)。For more information, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview). 若要更改菜单的大小, 请使用属性。To change the size of the menu, use the property.

summary.span: 在运行时将控件或嵌套菜单加载到当前菜单中时发生。

span.span: Occurs when controls or nested menus are loaded into the current menu at run time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户第一次展开菜单时, 将引发此事件。This event is raised the first time the user expands the menu. 如果在运行时修改菜单中的控件, 则当用户在添加控件或移除控件之后首次展开菜单时, 也会引发此事件。If you modify the controls in the menu at run time, this event is also raised the first time the user expands the menu after you add a control or remove a control. 仅当属性为`true`时, 才引发此事件。This event is raised only when the property is `true`.

summary.span: 获取或设置菜单的键盘访问键。

span.span: Gets or sets the keyboard access key of the menu.

value.span: 一个字符串，表示菜单的键盘访问键。

span.span: A string that represents the keyboard access key of the menu.

remarks.format: ## Remarks KeyTip 必须有1到3个字符, 并且不得包含空格、制表符或换行符。A KeyTip must have from 1 to 3 characters, and must not contain spaces, tabs, or newline characters. 所有字符都应大写。All characters should be upper case. Keytip 有时称为 "访问键" 或 "加速器", 用作激活控件的快捷键组合。KeyTips are sometimes known as access keys or accelerators and are used as shortcut key combinations that activate controls. 按 ALT 键时, 功能区上将显示键提示。KeyTips appear on the Ribbon when you press the ALT key. 如果 KeyTip 与内置控件或其他外接程序的 keytip 发生冲突, Microsoft Office 可能会自动分配不冲突的 KeyTip 值。If your KeyTip conflicts with KeyTips for built-in controls or from other add-ins, Microsoft Office might assign non-conflicting KeyTip values automatically. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[使用键盘处理功能区程序](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=93523)。For more information, see [Use the keyboard to work with Ribbon programs](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=93523).

summary.span: 获取或设置菜单所显示的文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the text that is displayed by the menu.

value.span: 菜单所显示的文本。

span.span: The text that is displayed by the menu.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要隐藏标签, 请将属性设置`false`为。To hide the label, set the property to `false`.

summary.span: 如果要使用内置 Microsoft Office 图标，请获取或设置要在菜单上显示的图像。

span.span: Gets or sets the image to display on the menu, if you want to use a built-in Microsoft Office icon.

value.span: 作为此菜单图标的内置 Microsoft Office 图标的 ID。

span.span: The ID of a built-in Microsoft Office icon that serves as the icon for this menu.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性标识控件显示的 Office 图标。The property identifies an Office icon that is displayed by the control. 属性值是标识`imageMso`所选图标的值的字符串。The property value is a string that identifies the `imageMso` value of the selected icon. 此属性可在设计时或运行时设置。This property can be set at design time or at run time. 如果在运行时更新此属性, 控件的外观将更新以反映更改。If you update this property at run time, the control's appearance is updated to reflect the change. 有关`imageMso`值的列表, 请参阅 Microsoft 下载中心页面[Office 2010 外接程序:图标库](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=220760)。For a list of `imageMso` values, see the Microsoft Download Center page [Office 2010 Add-In: Icons Gallery](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=220760). 如果设置了属性, 则忽略此属性。This property is ignored if the property is set. 由于图像缓存在 Office 应用程序中, 因此可以比属性标识的图像稍快地加载属性标识的图像。Images identified by the property can be loaded slightly faster than images identified by the property, because the images are cached in the Office application. 属性`true`必须为, 控件才能显示图像。The property must be `true` for the control to display the image. 在设计时设置属性时, Visual Studio 会将属性自动设置为`true`。When you set the property at design time, Visual Studio automatically sets the property to `true`. 如果在运行时设置属性, 必须在代码中将属性设置为`true` 。If you set the property at run time, you must set the property to `true` in your code. ## Examples 下面的示例将 Microsoft Office 图标分配给菜单。The following example assigns a Microsoft Office icon to a menu. 若要运行此代码示例, 必须首先执行以下步骤:To run this code example, you must first perform the following steps: 1. 向 Office 项目添加 "**功能区 (可视化设计器)** " 项。Add a **Ribbon (Visual Designer)** item to an Office project. 2. 将组添加到自定义选项卡。Add a group to the custom tab. 3. 将菜单添加到组。Add a menu to the group. 4. 将菜单的**动态**属性设置为`true`。Set the **Dynamic** property of the menu to `true`. [!code-csharp[Trin_Ribbon_ControlProperties#7](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_Ribbon_ControlProperties/CS/Ribbon1.cs#7)] [!code-vb[Trin_Ribbon_ControlProperties#7](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_Ribbon_ControlProperties/VB/Ribbon1.vb#7)]

summary.span: 获取或设置菜单的位置（如果该菜单在 Microsoft Office 菜单上）。

span.span: Gets or sets the position of the menu, if the menu is on the Microsoft Office Menu.

value.span: 一个 ，表示菜单的位置（如果该菜单在 Microsoft Office 菜单上）。

span.span: A that represents the position of the menu, if the menu is on the Microsoft Office Menu.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅在某些情况下, 才能在运行时设置此属性。This property can be set at run time only under certain conditions. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview)。For more information, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview). 当菜单放置在功能区选项卡上时, 属性不起作用。The property has no effect when the menu is placed on a Ribbon tab.

summary.span: 获取或设置用户将指针移到菜单上方时显示的提示文本。

span.span: Gets or sets tip text that appears when the user moves the pointer over the menu.

value.span: 用户将指针移到菜单上方时显示的文本。

span.span: The text that appears when the user moves the pointer over the menu.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值的长度必须小于1024个字符。The value must be less than 1024 characters in length. 设置属性时 , 值显示为的标题。 When the property is set, the value appears as the title of the .

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示与菜单关联的图像是否可见。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the image that is associated with the menu is visible.

value.span: 如果与该菜单关联的图像可见，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the image that is associated with the menu is visible; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `true`如果在设计时设置、或属性, 则此属性将自动设置为。This property is automatically set to `true` if you set the , , or property at design time. 如果在设计时或运行`true`时将属性设置为`Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge` , 则此属性将自动设置为。This property is automatically set to `true` if you set the property to `Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge` at design time or run time.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示菜单的标签是否可见。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the label for the menu is visible.

value.span: 如果菜单的标签可见，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the label for the menu is visible; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`true` `Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`将属性设置为, 则此属性始终为。 This property is always `true` if you set the property to `Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`.

summary.span: 获取或设置用户将指针移到菜单上时显示的多行提示文本。

span.span: Gets or sets multiline tip text that appears when the user moves the pointer over the menu.

value.span: 包含多行提示文本的字符串。

span.span: A string that contains multiline tip text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字符串的长度必须小于1024个字符。The string must be less than 1024 characters in length. 显示在 " 文本" 下。The appears under text. 与不同的是 , 会在字符串中启用分行符。Unlike the , the enables line breaks in the string.

summary.span: 获取或设置标题，此标题在用户展开添加到 Microsoft Office 菜单的菜单时显示。

span.span: Gets or sets the title that is displayed when the user expands a menu that is added to the Microsoft Office Menu.

value.span: 此标题在用户展开添加到 Microsoft Office 菜单的菜单时显示。

span.span: The title that is displayed when the user expands a menu that is added to the Microsoft Office Menu.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果菜单位于功能区选项卡上, 则此属性不起作用。This property has no effect if the menu is on a Ribbon tab.
